remarks: A condition for an atom to be less than or equal to a lattice element. Part of proof of Lemma A in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atomle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atomle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atomle.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atomle.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
exatleN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ ( P .<_ X /\ -. Q .<_ X /\ R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) -> ( R .<_ X <-> R = P ) ) $.
